SELECT device_seq, device_uid, device_onoff, device_status, device_dt, mem_company, sbs_seq, sbs_alias, data_check FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tb_device IDX_tb_device_PK) */ rownum rn, d.device_seq, d.device_uid, d.device_onoff, d.device_status, d.device_dt, d.mem_company, d.sbs_seq, d.sbs_alias, d.data_check FROM ( SELECT d.device_seq, d.device_uid, d.device_onoff, d.device_status, d.device_dt, (SELECT mem_company FROM tb_member m WHERE m.mem_id = s.mem_id AND s.device_seq = d.device_seq) AS mem_company, (SELECT sbs_seq FROM tb_subscription s WHERE s.device_seq = d.device_seq AND s.sbs_status = 'Y') AS sbs_seq, (SELECT sbs_alias FROM tb_subscription s WHERE s.device_seq = d.device_seq AND s.sbs_status = 'Y') AS sbs_alias, (SELECT COUNT(log_seq) FROM tb_log l WHERE l.device_uid = d.device_uid AND l.log_dt >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '5' MINUTE) AS data_check FROM tb_device d JOIN tb_subscription s ON s.device_seq = d.device_seq JOIN tb_member m ON m.mem_id = s.mem_id ORDER BY device_status DESC, device_seq DESC ) d WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
